        @RequestMapping(value="/find",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public HttpJsonResult<List<SysRole>> findRole(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                 String name,
                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                 Integer status,

                                                                 Integer pi,
                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                 Integer ps)

                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public HttpJsonResult<SysRole> getRole(@PathVariable
                                                          Integer roleId)

@ResponseBody

@ResponseBody

                                                                               Integer userId)

      • assignUserRole

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/assign",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public HttpJsonResult<Boolean> assignUserRole(@RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                 Integer userId,
                                                                 @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                 String roleIds)

      • unassignUserRole

@ResponseBody

                                                                   Integer userId,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                   String roleIds)
